#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>

#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
     int i,r=0;
     cin>>i;
     for(int j=1;j<=i;j++)
     {

         int x=j;
         while(x>0)
         {

             if(x%2==1)
             {r++;}

             x/=2;
         }

     }

    cout<<r<<endl;
    }

return 0;
}
